mapper.select: select mno, mname, (select mnick from member m where m.mno = a.mno) mnick, address, acontent, acode, atake, grant_date,delflag, request_date, (select substr(aname,0,4) from authority_type at where a.acode = at.acode) aname from authority a where mno = #{mno} and acode = #{acode} and grant_date is null
mapper.update: update authority a set atake = 'Y', grant_date = sysdate where mno = (select mno from member where mnick = #{mnick})
update authority set delflag = 'Y' where mno = (select mno from member where mnick = #{mnick})
